Title: Rain Powder
Description:
Not actual rain, its actually a gun!

thanks to b1g ideas shoe from the RW discord for drawing the last thumbnail! (sorry)

NOTE: guns do not spawn naturally
use dev console to spawn them in lol

teh new update:
-Mac10, a fast firing gun that hold 30 ammo and uses rocks to refill
-Gun system overhaul, now it should be much easier to add guns to this mod
